subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: José María Olazábal, Europe’s captain for the Ryder Cup, said Padraig Harrington would have to show some extraordinary play to avoid missing the event for the first time since 1995.
snippet: José María Olazábal, Europe’s captain for the Ryder Cup, said Padraig Harrington would have to show some extraordinary play to avoid missing the event for the first time since 1995.
